page.title: 09IMPACT OF SCIENCE ON DACRE.
page.content: There are all kinds of vehicles cars vans tractors and wagons. The cars can go up to about 110 m.p.h there were tractors and different types of machinery like trailers and crop sprayers .In Dacre there is a post office with a post box and a public phone to go with it.There is a silo tower on one of the farms for silage. Electric fences are used for stopping cows getting out of fields.We often get low flying aircraft Royal Air Force planes.On a smaller scale we have welders and other electric tools. Electricity is used in our houses for tv.,radio,cooking,washing,refrigerato rs ,cleaners and we have telephones some people have microwave ovens.Science and technoligy has effected farming in the area resulting in less people employed on the land.
